args: You have a sec, Ranzal? There's something\nI've been meaning to ask you.
We're just here to gather up people who've\nlost their homes in the war, right?
So is there really a need for\n{player_name} to go out of his\nway to come along?
Heh. Yer answer's right over there.
Please follow us, everyone. You can stay\nat our castle for as long as you like.
I can't believe the prince himself\nhas come to our aid!
These folks've been through hell and back,\nbut he knows just how to put 'em at ease.
Heh. That is SO like him.
Are you well, {player_name}?\nYour breathing is terribly uneven.
Oh no! Your face is bright red!\nDo you have a fever?!
Please just...don't fuss over me...\nIf others see me like this...\nthey might lose heart...
I have returned from my patrol and am\nready to give my repor—YOUR HIGHNESS!
He collapsed from a fever—most likely\ncaused by overwork.
Cleo, you must heal him right away!\n...Wait, no! I have to give my report!
Has something happened, Elisanne?\nIt's not like you to lose your composure.
I fear there are imperial soldiers\nwaiting on the road ahead.
So? Those chumps are a dime a dozen.\nWe'll take 'em out and keep moving.
That would be all well and good if we were\nunaccompanied, but we must protect the\ncivilians who travel with us.
And we got wounded and elderly with us,\nso we can't be divergin' off into the woods.
Um, guys? What's wrong?\nWhy is everyone so serious?
Uh oh. Now the kids are worried...\nThat's the very thing the prince was\ntrying to avoid by coming with us.
Well then, it's time to do what HE\nwould do at a time like this!
Everything's going to be fine, folks!\nYou're all in good hands!
That's right. We've protected plenty of\nvillages that were attacked by the Empire.
So don't you worry about a thing.\nYou'll be safe with us!
Right then! How many imperial soldiers\nare we talking about, Elisanne?
Not that many, but they appear formidable.\nIt's likely a small, elite unit.
Well, at least they can't surround us.\nCan we force our way through?
Ordinarily, perhaps. But to attempt that\nwhile traveling with civilians...
In that case, I'll act as a decoy.\nOnce I lead the soldiers away,\nyou take these people and go.
By yourself? That sounds like a\nvery reckless plan.
But at least it's only dangerous for me\nand not everyone else.
I'm opposed, too.\nIt's just too dangerous alone.
Hey, let me finish. I'm opposed, but...\nIf {player_name} were here,\nI think he'd say the same thing you did.
He'd say that we can't put those people in\ndanger.
...So that's why I'm coming with you.\nTwo decoys mean half the chance of\nsomething going wrong.
It's a crazy plan—but if anybody can pull\nit off, it's these two.
The moment ya pull them soldiers away,\nwe'll take the civilians and push through.
This is going to work. I know it!
I swear it on my honor as a Paladyn\nto keep these villagers safe.
We'll see each other again soon.
All right, let's do this. Yaaaaaaaaah!
With the courageous efforts of Sarisse and Luca,\neveryone made it safely to the castle.\nAnd the next day...
Thank you so much, Sarisse. I don't know\nwhat we would have done without you.
You sure you should be up and around\nthere, {player_name}?
I'm a little woozy, but I'll be all right.\nI heard what happened yesterday;\nwhat you did was amazing.
They say you took command in my place?
Oh, I dunno if I ＂took command＂ so much\nas I tried to do what I thought you'd do.
Besides, everyone else did all the heavy\nlifting, so it's not really a big deal.
Do you remember what you said to me\nwhen we were helping the village that\nwas attacked by the Empire?
You said people who make you want to\nhelp others are special.
Sure, I remember. Er, but why are\nyou bringing it up now?
Don't you see? Everyone helped you,\nwhich means YOU have this special talent.
Now that you mention it, we did simply\ndo as she bade us without hesitation.
She's thoughtful of others, has a strong\nsense of right and wrong, and takes charge\nof the situation.
It was like watching a little\n{player_name} in action.
But if you really think I can be like\n{player_name} one day...
That means I've found my dream!
That's great news. I'm sure everyone\nback home will be happy to hear it.
So are you gonna fill us in on this dream\nof yours or what? I bet it's a real whopper!
I'm gonna become chief of a new village!
That's a bit unrealistic, don't you think?

I mean you've gotta find somewhere
everyone can live, THEN bring people
with completely different opinions
together? Sounds impossible to me!
But our village only existed because\nsomeone started it, right?
There've been loads of chiefs ever since,\nbut SOMEONE had to be the founder.
So why can't I found my own?
Okay, sure. But what made you come up\nwith this crazy plan to begin with?
I want to be for sylvans what\n{player_name} is for all of us.
Someone who fights alongside everyone\nfor the good of all.
And since the closest thing sylvans have\nto royalty is a chief, I'll just have to\nbecome one of those!
Heh, you make it sound like no big deal.
Well, if you've made your mind up,\nit's not my job to change it—it's my job\nto stand back and cheer you on!
But man, Sarisse. I figured you'd\nland on something big, but I didn't\nthink it would be THIS big!
If anyone can pull this off, it's her.
No matter how tough the road ahead\nmight be, her spirit will see her through.
Just you wait. This dream WILL happen!
